attributes.action: provide free public transport to all full-time students during the week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students are forced to spend a large amount of money to get anywhere - sometimes even to get to their educational establishment if they are over 16, therefore we would like the government to provide free travel on buses and trains for all full time students

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide free public transport to all full-time students during the week."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22283


Prime Minister's Office
